ip_address.docs:
Expose the IP Address of the ESP as a text sensor. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).



*See also: [WiFi Info Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/wifi_info.html#configuration-variables)*

scan_results.docs:
Expose the latest networks found during the latest scan. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).



*See also: [WiFi Info Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/wifi_info.html#configuration-variables)*

ssid.docs:
Expose the SSID of the currently connected WiFi network as a text sensor. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).



*See also: [WiFi Info Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/wifi_info.html#configuration-variables)*

bssid.docs:
Expose the BSSID of the currently connected WiFi network as a text sensor. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).



*See also: [WiFi Info Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/wifi_info.html#configuration-variables)*

mac_address.docs:
Expose the Mac Address of the WiFi card. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).



*See also: [WiFi Info Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/wifi_info.html#configuration-variables)*
